channel.title: How do I add NPCs and things to my Moparscape?
channel.description: How do I add NPCs and things to my Moparscape? :confused: Sorry, this must seem like such a noobish question. :(

item.title: How do I add NPCs and things to my Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @itachi_uchia itachi uchia
item.description:
@itachi_uchia wrote:

Ok,first you have to start with a source ( recommended PVPscape or Phonescape. )
Then,you have to learn java.Like coding for RS.

Then,you can add stuff,spawn monsters,add locations and all that.
But you defienetly need expierice.It takes time so be patient.

Go to Mod Taharock’s guide to make a server.
Another recommended thing is to go to the tuts section and code there.

BTW a HUGE AND IMPORTANT THING IS MOD TAHAROCK’S/GOD OF IKILIKI’S PERFECT COMPILER!!!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add NPCs and things to my Moparscape?
